name: Plate Abs Workout
description: Intense ab circuit using a weight plate. 4 rounds of 4 exercises, 20 reps each with 60 seconds rest between rounds.

exercises.name: Sit Up Twist
exercises.notes: Keep plate extended, control the descent, alternate sides

exercises.name: Suitcases
exercises.notes: Keep arms straight, fold knees to elbows while keeping plate extended

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.notes: Press lower back into floor, lift hips slightly at top

exercises.name: Toe Touches
exercises.notes: Keep legs vertical, reach plate to toes

tips: Great as a core finisher after main workout
